text: A&E; is an American basic cable network. It is the flagship television property of A&E; Networks. It was founded in 1984 as the Arts & Entertainment Network, initially focusing on fine arts, documentaries, dramas, and educational entertainment. Today, the network airs non-fiction programming, including reality docusoaps, true crime, documentaries, and miniseries. Category:American television channels Category:1984 establishments in the United States
title: A&E (TV network)
